name: TE-00
description:
A Short Puzzle Game made for BYOG 2021 Game Jam.

Send Commands to a Bot and help him reach his destination. 

Use different cameras to scout out the map. And send the steps to reach the end to Bot.

DevLog: "I think I didn't pick the best font for the game.  I thought it was ok, even good. But the initial testers review is 'It's hard to read and even confusing', which make them not properly go through the tutorial. The A/R and H/K look the really similar in game. It's specially bad if you misunderstand 'A' with 'R', as 'A' 'D' & 'C' are the only keyboard keys used in game for controls. I can update the build, but since it's for a Jam, I don't want to change the initial build till the judging is over." - 24, Oct, 21  - 19:34

*Credits for the assets used are in game folder*
